Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm, this is a detailed BPMN analysis request. The user wants a thorough explanation of the business process, including gateways, task purposes, path convergence, and conditions for approvals/loops.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should structure this by first giving an executive summary of the process, then break it down into phases: initial request handling, standard/custom branching, parallel checks, approval logic, and final steps. The gateways need special attention since they control the flow.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For the standard vs custom paths, I will highlight how validation differs (parallel checks vs feasibility analysis) and where they converge (before the approval gateway). The approval conditions and loopbacks are critical need to clarify that rework goes back to different points based on request type.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: The explanation should be technical but accessible, avoiding jargon without context. I will use bold for key terms but keep the tone professional and clear.
